summary: The Veteran Fraud Reimbursement Act of 2025 amends Title 38 of the United States Code to address the misuse of veterans' benefits by fiduciaries. It mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to reimburse the beneficiary or their successor for misused funds. The bill also outlines procedures for recouping misused benefits from fiduciaries and distributing recouped funds. It sets limitations on the total amount paid and mandates oversight regarding negligence by the Secretary in fiduciary oversight.
